de-DE: 12.9: * Customers with unclaimed domain credits can register domains in the app. * You can expand the Comment Editor to Full Screen for more space while editing. * The Block editor has a few improvements: Video blocks are available, and a some issues that led to content loss when using unsupported blocks have been resolved.
en-US: 12.9: * Customers with unclaimed domain credits can register domains in the app. * You can expand the Comment Editor to Full Screen for more space while editing. * The Block editor has a few improvements: Video blocks are available, and a some issues that led to content loss when using unsupported blocks have been resolved.
es-ES: 12.9: * Los clientes con créditos de dominio no reclamados pueden registrar dominios en la aplicación. * Puedes expandir el editor de comentarios a pantalla completa para tener más espacio durante la edición. * El editor de bloques tiene algunas mejoras: Los bloques de vídeo ya están disponibles, y se han resuelto algunos problemas que llevaron a la pérdida de contenido cuando se utilizaban bloques no compatibles.
fr-CA: 12.9: * Customers with unclaimed domain credits can register domains in the app. * You can expand the Comment Editor to Full Screen for more space while editing. * The Block editor has a few improvements: Video blocks are available, and a some issues that led to content loss when using unsupported blocks have been resolved.

it-IT: 12.9: * Customers with unclaimed domain credits can register domains in the app. * You can expand the Comment Editor to Full Screen for more space while editing. * The Block editor has a few improvements: Video blocks are available, and a some issues that led to content loss when using unsupported blocks have been resolved.
nl-NL: 12.9: * Customers with unclaimed domain credits can register domains in the app. * You can expand the Comment Editor to Full Screen for more space while editing. * The Block editor has a few improvements: Video blocks are available, and a some issues that led to content loss when using unsupported blocks have been resolved.
pt-BR: 12.9: * Usuários com crédito de domínios disponíveis podem registrar domínios no aplicativo. * Você pode expandir o editor de comentários para tela cheia para ter mais espaço ao editar. * Algumas melhorias no editor de blocos: blocos de vídeo estão disponíveis e corrigimos alguns erros com perda de conteúdo ao usar blocos não suportados.
ru-RU: 12.9: * Пользователи с неиспользованной ещё возможностью зарегистрировать домен теперь могут сделать это прямо из приложения. * Редактор комментариев при редактировании можно развернуть на весь экран. * Улучшения в редакторе блоков: доступны блоки видео, исправлена проблема с возможной потерей данных при использовании неподдерживаемых блоков.
sv-SE: 12.9: * Kunder som inte utnyttjat sin fulla domänkredit kan registrera domäner i appen. * Du kan expandera kommentarsredigeraren så att den upptar hela skärmen, för mer utrymmen när du redigerar. * Några förbättringar i blockredigeraren: Nu finns videoblock, och några problem som kunde leda till förlorat innehåll vid användning av block utan stöd har nu lösts.
tr-TR: 12.9: * Sahipsiz alan adı kredisi olan müşteriler, alan adlarını uygulamaya kaydedebilir. * Düzenleme sırasında daha fazla yer açmak için yorum düzenleyiciyi tam ekrana genişletebilirsiniz. * Blok düzenleyicinin birkaç geliştirmesi var: Video blokları var ve desteklenmeyen blokları kullanırken içerik kaybına neden olan bazı sorunlar çözüldü.
zh-CN: 12.9: * Customers with unclaimed domain credits can register domains in the app. * You can expand the Comment Editor to Full Screen for more space while editing. * The Block editor has a few improvements:Video blocks are available, and a some issues that led to content loss when using unsupported blocks have been resolved.
